name: CHHapticParameterCurve
desc: A curve that you send to a haptic pattern player to alter a property value gradually during playback.

items.name: init(parameterID: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID, controlPoints: [CHHapticParameterCurve.ControlPoint], relativeTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Creates a parameter curve from its parameter ID, control points, and start time.

items.name: class CHHapticParameterCurve.ControlPoint
items.desc: A single control point in a parameter curve.

items.name: var controlPoints: [CHHapticParameterCurve.ControlPoint]
items.desc: An array containing the curve's control points.

items.name: var parameterID: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: The parameter ID defining the type of parameter that the curve represents.

items.name: var relativeTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time at which this parameter curve is applied, relative to the start time of the pattern.
